metadata.title: CVE-2021-21200 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read in WebUI Settings in Google Chrome prior to 89.0.4389.72allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory read via acrafted HTML page. (Chrome security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
